name: Turn-Based Champion
description: Turn-Based Champion is a rpg party game where you and your friends compete in minigames and take on monsters and bosses through turn-based battles to compete for the title of Champion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Opengl 2.1 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Opengl 2.1 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
